name: Astrobot II
overview: A single screen platformer written by Roger Svensson of CBI and released in 1988. It is the sequel to the original Astrobot. This version uses entirely different game sprites from the first. In it you need to pick up the hearts and avoid the alien completely, even the slightest collision with him will make you start over. Once you get all the hearts you move on to the next level.
